name: Steps in Silence #26
description: This image is part of my photo series project entitled Steps in Silence. Was starting from the curiosity to take pictures at night when a lot of human activities have stopped, I did it from midnight to early morning. I forced myself to walk along the streets and corners of the city, tried to find subjects that in a form and time had a “soul”. I didn't know what I was really doing, I just stepped in and set my sights. Night time makes me avoid distractions and can concentrate more to see and feel. For me, and maybe also most people, a quiet atmosphere can be self-reflection and sometimes it's a good time to have a dialogue with ourself.
